title: Devourer is the best thing to happen in a long time
body:
Haven't seen a single {{champion:64}} since {{item:3930}} went live, that alone makes it worth. Nice change of pace if nothing else.

Between that and no {{champion:238}} things feel fresh, it's been a LONG time since I said that!

Honestly nothing has made the game more exciting than playing without these two. I never realized how large an impact those two champions alone made on my enjoyment of the game and that feeling that it was just stale for so long.

replies.body: Yep, nice not to see a character that actually requires some level of brain activity to play. I'd much rather see {{champion:11}} with {{item:3710}} who can deal over a thousand true damage in a matter of seconds. I like this new enchantment.

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Dyment,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kNK3hvzK,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-12T20:52:44.039+0000)
>
> Yep, nice not to see a character that actually requires some level of brain activity to play. I'd much rather see {{champion:11}} with {{item:3710}} who can deal over a thousand true damage in a matter of seconds. I like this new enchantment.

lol, Yi requires much smarter positioning and objective play than Lee Sin. He's not exactly an 8 skill gotta master all his abilities champ, but neither is Lee Sin.

> [{quoted}](name=Aametherar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kNK3hvzK,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-07-12T21:05:19.942+0000)
>
Yi requires much smarter positioning and objective play

You lost me there.
Lee Sin destroys most Devourer jungles early.

> [{quoted}](name=Yenn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kNK3hvzK,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-12T21:46:50.247+0000)
>
> Lee Sin destroys most Devourer jungles early.

My thoughts exactly.

Sated is being used and "abused" because its the shiny new thing right now.

It's the same deal as when Ludens came out, people didn't know if it was OP or not, but hey, NEW DAMAGE ITEM SO LETS ALL BUY IT ON EVERY CHAMP EVER.

Let the hype settle, and we will see through devourer more clearly. I honestly wouldn't recommend taking it every game. If you have played it, you will be hoping to god that your teammates won't throw before the 20 minute mark

If you can get to that point.
Remember, you've not only got to stack Devourer, you've got to build your on hit items to go with it.

People think sated is op when it's balanced and fine . sated only does so much damage and that's it or you can go back to the regular devourer that can indefinitely stack and was somewhat useless in a way
Ohh man aatrox isn't weak now like everyone says he is weak so because he can be even with the rest of the class he is all of a sudden of

You're honestly saying that every other champion needs an indirect nerf because Sated makes BotRK OP on a few???

-_-
I am just glad I have an item that I like now.  I like playing jungle again.  So happy.

I hate it so hard.  Lee was obnoxious, yes.  But SD invalidates almost every jungler who can't abuse it and that's not any fun.  Most of the champs who are strong with it are hardcore pubstompers too.  It's making solo queue obnoxious because you KNOW some jackass will feed the Yi or Xin or Jax.

Not true,

Tanks and some Bruisers directly counter most of the Devour junglers.

Use common sense bruh

> [{quoted}](name=Deitrix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kNK3hvzK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-12T16:43:19.188+0000)
>
> I hate it so hard.  Lee was obnoxious, yes.  But SD invalidates almost every jungler who can't abuse it and that's not any fun.  Most of the champs who are strong with it are hardcore pubstompers too.  It's making solo queue obnoxious because you KNOW some jackass will feed the Yi or Xin or Jax.

My JG main is Elise so I've been hating the jungle for a long time. TBH my joy isn't really about sated. I've played some adc some support and some old JG (mostly xin who I never really got into). It's just about the change of pace.

When I tried yi he still beat and lost to the same champs, his main tool is still trying to overcome a winning team via split pushing IMO unless you build him really tanky in which case he's probably not the right pick.

What sample size are we talking about? Lee's playrate has hardly been dented.

http://www.lolking.net/champions/leesin&region=all&map=sr&queue=1x1#statistics

http://champion.gg/champion/LeeSin
